title: Bellacollina Farms ~ Beautiful Briones Retreat
description: This new, expansive and beautiful farm setting retreat has relaxing interiors and fabulous grounds to explore and enjoy. In a world of its own, escape the hustle and bustle for the rural countryside, centrally located in the hidden valley of Briones, CA tucked away between Pleasant Hill/ Walnut Creek, Lafayette, Berkeley and less than 19 miles due east of downtown San Francisco. Close access to freeways and BART
